verses.verse: נָֽקְטָ֥ה <WH5354> is weary נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> My soul בְּחַ֫יָּ֥י <WH2416> of my life אֶֽעֶזְבָ֣ה <WH5800> I will leave עָלַ֣י <WH5921> unto שִׂיחִ֑י <WH7879> my complaint אֲ֝דַבְּרָה֗ <WH1696> upon myself I will speak בְּמַ֣ר <WH4751> in the bitterness נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> of my soul

אֹמַ֣ר <WH559> I will say אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱ֭לוֹהַּ <WH433> unto God אַל־ <WH408> not תַּרְשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <WH7561> Do not condemn הֽ֝וֹדִיעֵ֗נִי <WH3045> me shew עַ֣ל <WH5921> and מַה־ <WH4100> how long תְּרִיבֵֽנִי׃ <WH7378> me wherefore thou contendest

הֲט֤וֹב <WH2896> right לְךָ֨ ׀ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> indeed תַעֲשֹׁ֗ק <WH6231> unto thee that thou shouldest oppress כִּֽי־ <WH3588> indeed תִ֭מְאַס <WH3988> that thou shouldest despise יְגִ֣יעַ <WH3018> the work כַּפֶּ֑יךָ <WH3709> of thine hands וְעַל־ <WH5921> on עֲצַ֖ת <WH6098> upon the counsel רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> wicked הוֹפָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH3313> and shine
הַעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> Hast thou eyes בָשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> body לָ֑ךְ אִם־ <WH518> lo כִּרְא֖וֹת <WH7200> seeth אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> thou as man תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> see
הֲכִימֵ֣י <WH3117> [Are] thy days אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> of a mortal יָמֶ֑יךָ <WH3117> as the days אִם־ <WH518> Or שְׁ֝נוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH8141> your years כִּ֣ימֵי <WH3117> days גָֽבֶר׃ <WH1397> as man's
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> That thou enquirest לַעֲוֹנִ֑י <WH5771> after mine iniquity וּ֭לְחַטָּאתִ֥י <WH2403> sin תִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH1875> and searchest

עַֽל־ <WH5921> According דַּ֭עְתְּךָ <WH1847> Thou knowest כִּי־ <WH3588> I am indeed לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶרְשָׁ֑ע <WH7561> that I am not wicked וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> there מִיָּדְךָ֣ <WH3027> out of thine hand מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> and [there is] none that can deliver

יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> Thine hands עִ֭צְּבוּנִי <WH6087> have made וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֑וּנִי <WH6213> me and fashioned יַ֥חַד <WH3162> me together סָ֝בִ֗יב <WH5439> round about וַֽתְּבַלְּעֵֽנִי׃ <WH1104> yet thou dost destroy

זְכָר־ <WH2142> Remember נָ֭א <WH4994> now כִּי־ <WH3588> as כַחֹ֣מֶר <WH2563> me as the clay עֲשִׂיתָ֑נִי <WH6213> I beseech thee that thou hast made וְֽאֶל־ <WH413> into עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> me into dust תְּשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃ <WH7725> again
הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> like כֶ֭חָלָב <WH2461> as milk תַּתִּיכֵ֑נִי <WH5413> Hast thou not poured me out וְ֝כַגְּבִנָּ֗ה <WH1385> cheese תַּקְפִּיאֵֽנִי׃ <WH7087> and curdled

ע֣וֹר <WH5785> me with skin וּ֭בָשָׂר <WH1320> and flesh תַּלְבִּישֵׁ֑נִי <WH3847> Thou hast clothed וּֽבַעֲצָמ֥וֹת <WH6106> me with bones וְ֝גִידִ֗ים <WH1517> and sinews תְּסֹכְכֵֽנִי׃ <WH5526> and knit

חַיִּ֣ים <WH2416> me life וָ֭חֶסֶד <WH2617> and favour עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> Thou hast granted עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> against וּ֝פְקֻדָּתְךָ֗ <WH6486> and thy visitation שָֽׁמְרָ֥ה <WH8104> hath preserved רוּחִֽי׃ <WH7307> my spirit

וְ֭אֵלֶּה <WH428> these צָפַ֣נְתָּ <WH6845> And these [things] hast thou hid בִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> in thine heart יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּי־ <WH3588> for זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> is within

אִם־ <WH518> If חָטָ֥אתִי <WH2398> If I sin וּשְׁמַרְתָּ֑נִי <WH8104> then thou markest וּ֝מֵעֲוֹנִ֗י <WH5771> me from mine iniquity לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תְנַקֵּֽנִי׃ <WH5352> me and thou wilt not acquit

אִם־ <WH518> If רָשַׁ֡עְתִּי <WH7561> If I be wicked אַלְלַ֬י <WH480> woe לִ֗י וְ֭צָדַקְתִּי <WH6663> unto me and [if] I be righteous לֹא־ <WH3808> not אֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> [yet] will I not lift up רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> my head שְׂבַ֥ע <WH7646> have enough קָ֝ל֗וֹן <WH7036> of confusion וּרְאֵ֥ה <WH7200> advise self עָנְיִֽי׃ <WH6040> thou mine affliction

וְ֭יִגְאֶה <WH1342> For it increaseth כַּשַּׁ֣חַל <WH7826> me as a fierce lion תְּצוּדֵ֑נִי <WH6679> Thou huntest וְ֝תָשֹׁ֗ב <WH7725> and again תִּתְפַּלָּא־ <WH6381> thou shewest thyself marvellous בִֽי׃

תְּחַדֵּ֬שׁ <WH2318> Thou renewest עֵדֶ֨יךָ ׀ <WH5707> thy witnesses נֶגְדִּ֗י <WH5048> against וְתֶ֣רֶב <WH7235> against me and increasest כַּֽ֭עַשְׂךָ <WH3708> thine indignation עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> upon me חֲלִיפ֖וֹת <WH2487> changes וְצָבָ֣א <WH6635> and war עִמִּֽי׃ <WH5973> toward

וְלָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why מֵ֭רֶחֶם <WH7358> matrix הֹצֵאתָ֑נִי <WH3318> Wherefore then hast thou brought me forth אֶ֝גְוַ֗ע <WH1478> die וְעַ֣יִן <WH5869> and no eye לֹא־ <WH3808> and no תִרְאֵֽנִי׃ <WH7200> had seen

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> not הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> have been אֶהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> been מִ֝בֶּ֗טֶן <WH990> from the womb לַקֶּ֥בֶר <WH6913> to the grave אוּבָֽל׃ <WH2986> I should have been as though I had not been I should have been carried

הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> a little יָמַ֣י <WH3117> [Are] not my days [יֶחְדָּל כ] (וַחֲדָ֑ל <WH2308> cease ק) [יָשִׁית כ] (וְשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> apply ק) מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <WH4480> at וְאַבְלִ֥יגָה <WH1082> that I may take comfort מְּעָֽט׃ <WH4592> A little

בְּטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> Before אֵ֭לֵךְ <WH1980> go וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not אָשׁ֑וּב <WH7725> [whence] I shall not return אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> [even] to the land חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> of darkness וְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <WH6757> and the shadow of death

אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> A land עֵיפָ֨תָה ׀ <WH5890> of darkness כְּמ֥וֹ <WH3644> as אֹ֗פֶל <WH652> as darkness צַ֭לְמָוֶת <WH6757> [itself and] of the shadow of death וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> without סְדָרִ֗ים <WH5468> without any order וַתֹּ֥פַע <WH3313> and [where] the light כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> according to אֹֽפֶל׃ <WH652> [is] as darkness פ
